scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=api
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=api
scripts.check: npm run check --workspace=frontend && npm run check --workspace=api
scripts.check:fix: npm run check:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run check:fix --workspace=api
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=frontend && npm run typecheck --workspace=api
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=api
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=frontend && npm run format --workspace=api
